title: Tiny Wins
safety_notes: Keep actions safe and simple; choose tasks you can complete now.

offCopy.intro: Action precedes motivation. We'll start with something you can finish in two minutes.

steps.label: Pick
steps.body: Choose a 2-minute task (dish, email, stretch, tidy corner).

steps.label: Plan
steps.body: If/Then: 'If I get distracted, then I will resume immediately.'

steps.label: Do
steps.body: Start your 2-minute timer now and complete the task.

offCopy.completion: Momentum beats perfection. What's your next tiny win?

verseKJV.text: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord...

light.prompt: Offer this small act to God.

verseKJV.text: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;

disciple.identity: You work as unto the Lord.

verseKJV.text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much.

kingdom.commission: Small faithfulness trains you for greater service.
